data.name: Kraino ReAnimated Demo
data.detailed_description: This Demo is just a small sampling of what to expect from Kraino ReAnimated. In This Demo there are enemies to fight, secrets to find, hazards to avoid, and both a mini and level boss to test out your scythe swinging skills.
data.about_the_game: This Demo is just a small sampling of what to expect from Kraino ReAnimated. In This Demo there are enemies to fight, secrets to find, hazards to avoid, and both a mini and level boss to test out your scythe swinging skills.
data.short_description: Demo level with enemies, secrets. hazards and bosses!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,Windows 8,Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space MB available space

  • Processor: Dual Core CPU, 2 GHz, 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
